storyInfo: April was targeted by some bandits, back when she was a hunter. After trapping her assailants and learning what it meant to be an Infected, she was moved by their words and decided to help them.

attributes.content: Hey. It's me, Aerlie.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Did you hear the broadcast from camp just now...? Oh right, I'm still out on a job, about a day from Iron Carrot City.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Yeah! I thought I'd be back home in a couple days, but we got news earlier today that our survey team has to head to a deeper mining area after resupplying at the transport hub.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: *sigh*... Not like you can argue with the company when they tell you to go. Plus, they assigned me to be the escort, so what am I gonna do?
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Anyway, I won't be able to go to the party with you this week. Real sorry about that.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Well of course it's a bit of a shame. We've all been looking forward to it, especially considering how much time and effort it took to lock down that abandoned ore warehouse for a venue.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: I guess the bit of silver lining is I finished my portion of the prep work early. At least me not being able to show up won't mess with everyone else's plans.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: *sigh*... Yeah, we'll have another chance someday...
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: The weather should be a lot warmer for our next party at least. Then, we'll finally get to wear the dresses we bought last time.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: You've been looking forward to that too, haven't you? I even bought a pair of matching earrings.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Oh, that reminds me, you said you guys were rehearsing one of my favorite songs, to perform for me as a surprise at the party. But since I can't be there... do you think you could tell me which one it is?
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: ...How am I supposed to guess? The bands that I like can't be counted on my two hands, and each one has a dozen awesome albums. There's no way I'd be able to pick just one favorite.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: You're not seriously going to make me wait until the next party, are you? What if the company sends me out long-term?
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: ...Ooh, you're right, that song is a great pick!
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: You guys are going to be my superstar pop group one day, so I can finally realize my dream of having a concert right on my doorstep.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: The Cautus girl suddenly uses her hand to cover the communicator's receiver.
Woah, the fancy little Cautus girl's here? You're joking, right? There's no way someone would hire her.
attributes.name: Hunter's Voice

attributes.content: But, she's still a registered hunter. In principle, she's allowed to stay at the camp, though she usually acts alone...
attributes.name: Worker's Voice

attributes.content: Oh, the team's about to leave. I was going to keep complaining about how much of a pain in the butt this mission is, but that'll have to wait 'til next time.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Okay, I'll contact you again once I get back to town.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: If I were her, I'd keep my head down and beat it as soon as I could. But seeing the flashy way she dresses, she's probably no different from before, haha...
attributes.name: Hunter's Voice

attributes.content: Yeah, I think I'll keep my earphones in while I'm on the road.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Okay, that clears the air up just right! Let's get some music going so I don't get sleepy on the road!
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Hrmm, where did I put the newest bounty list... Oh, yes, it says right here that manglers are worth the most around here.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Well, I don't know how to deal with those big monsters either... Never mind then.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: It used to be just driving them off was good enough. Now, we're looking for trouble in their part of the woods.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Good thing I'm just short of the earnings I need. As long as I catch a few fowlbeasts, I should be good to go.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: According to the company benefits program, I can use my savings to buy an old projector that the company retired. Then, I can lie in bed and watch the discs I bought.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Err, but maybe I shouldn't... Once I get enough money, I should probably find a way to live better. Maybe a rental with good sound insulation so I won't bug my neighbors after a long night's work, or when I move furniture around in the middle of the night.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Ugh, I'm no good with this long-term planning stuff...
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Movement.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Let's see if luck is on my side today... Wounded beasts always try to run, so let's see if the traps from the textbooks work or not.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Woah, it's a person! That was a close one––
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Uhh, excuse me–– I'm not your prey, okay? I'm a hunter! Look how conspicuously I'm dressed. What kind of beast looks like this?
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: We don't make mistakes. You are our prey.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: Hand over any valuables you have on you, or we're gonna have to get a bit rough.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: *sigh*... Great, looks like I've got company after all...
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: There's one hiding in the trees over there, then another one by the rock behind me.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: I'm going to count down from three. Show us the money, if you know what's good for you. Otherwise, don't expect to get off with just a single arrow.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: Three.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: ...No can do.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Two.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: I worked hard to scrounge up this little bit of money.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: One.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: Let's see if you can catch me, instead!
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Oh, Aerlie, you're back again?
attributes.name: Grocery Store Owner

attributes.content: Sure am. I finally finished tidying up my place. Didn't expect there to be so much random stuff to get through, considering how small my room is.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Let me take a look... Oh my, these kinds of self-assembled storage cabinets aren't easy to sell second-hand, right? Plus, I see some tape marks.
attributes.name: Grocery Store Owner

attributes.content: Oh, that was an adhesive strip I stuck on the side of the cabinet. I had a makeshift full-length mirror there. I ended up tearing it off when I was having a bad day.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: You're right that it looks a bit tacky though... So it's okay if you drop the value a little.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Huh? This dress is still brand new, isn't it? Are you sure you want to sell it? Seems like a waste, if you ask me.
attributes.name: Grocery Store Owner

attributes.content: A little bit... but that cut doesn't work for me. It's backless, and that's a no-go.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Your Oripathy... Is it growing on your back?
attributes.name: Grocery Store Owner

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Alright, I get it. You just moved here pretty recently, right?
attributes.name: Grocery Store Owner

attributes.content: I see you've been around here the last few days to sell stuff off. Did something happen?
attributes.name: Grocery Store Owner

attributes.content: We're all Infected around here. I can hear you out if you'd like, just between the two of us.
attributes.name: Grocery Store Owner

attributes.content: It's nothing major. I just haven't been able to find work, and want to try my luck somewhere else.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: I can't lug these things around anyway, so might as well turn 'em into some cash.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: *sigh*... You say you want to try your luck somewhere else, but how do you know a new place would be any better? Do you already have someplace in mind?
attributes.name: Grocery Store Owner

attributes.content: Hmm... I saw an ad for a company and wanted to give it a shot. It's pretty far away though.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: I've already saved up enough money to get by in a new city. Now I just need enough to get a one-way ticket out of here.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: But don't worry, I've been budgeting carefully, so I've got everything I need.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Plus, even if I'm out of a job right now, I still have this bow. If my luck's good, I can maybe hunt some beasts just outside the city. Might even be able to fetch a decent price for the pelts and meat from the merchants in the camps.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Even if my luck's not so good... At least I don't see myself starving to death.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: *sigh*... You're still so young, be careful when you're out there hunting. And please take the long way around if you run into any Originium clusters... You wouldn't want your condition getting any worse.
attributes.name: Grocery Store Owner

attributes.content: Haha, I was with the minecart team for how many years? Of course I know that by now.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: I actually used to think about buying a secondhand speaker or projector as soon as I managed to scrounge up some money. Now that I finally have the money, I didn't expect it to feel so...
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Well, that's not quite right. I barely have a thing to my name now, so that probably doesn't count as 'having money.'
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Now that you've sold all this stuff off, I suppose you won't stick around much longer?
attributes.name: Grocery Store Owner

attributes.content: Right. I'll be leaving tomorrow morning.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Ugh, didn't anyone teach those kids not to run with knives? They're awfully fast, too!
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: But if I hand over my luggage, I really won't have anything left... And that's no way to survive. So let's go another way.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: My luck sure ended up rotten, huh? It's all because I was short a little money for my ticket, and I didn't want to dip into living expenses... Otherwise, I wouldn't have to hunt anymore.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Hey, you guys hear me talking out loud too, can't you? Mind sparing a girl an ounce of sympathy?
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Just as the blade of one of the bandits is about to reach her, the nimble Cautus hops into the air and climbs up a tree branch.
Aha, looks like those traps worked after all. Even managed to snag one of your crossbowmen in one.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Why you little––!
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: I wasn't planning on fighting, but now that you've fallen into my trap, you're my prey.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: I might look young, but I've trained in the ways of a hunter since I was little. I know a thing or two about archery and trapping too.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Here's a tip: these traps were made for beasts, so the harder you struggle, the more likely you are to hurt yourself.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: (Threats like that should be good enough, right? That's how they always do it on TV.)
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: (Ugh, I don't even know if there's a vigilante patrol around here, or a private security detail... Maybe I'll try asking for help once I get back to camp.)
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Phew... Can have a civil discussion now?
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Wh-What are you going to do to us? If you want to keep things civil, why don't you put the bow down first?
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: I'm just making sure the trap's doing its job. If you don't mind, I'm going to head back to camp and find someone to take you away.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: P-Please, anything but that... We'll die.
attributes.name: Apprehensive Bandit

attributes.content: Huh? You're that afraid of getting turned in? Have you been doing that much robbing?
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: No, but...
attributes.name: Apprehensive Bandit

attributes.content: We're all sick. Infected.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: You know what that means, Hunter. You said you didn't want to fight, but you don't sympathize with livestock, do you?
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: That's why they don't bother putting Infected on trial. We just go straight to...
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: There was a time when I would've said she wasn't cut out to be a hunter. But now that she's Infected, she's not even in the same class as us. Hahaha!
attributes.name: Hunter's Voice

attributes.content: Think she has something going on with the commissioner? Who the hell is still giving her work?
attributes.name: Hunter's Voice

attributes.content: Why did you decide to become bandits?
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: What kind of question is that? We caught Oripathy and lost our jobs. We can't just roll over and die, can we?
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: Like most Infected, the three of us worked in the mines for a long, long time.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: Um... What about the company's insurance coverage?
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: You talking about compensation for those who get infected on the job? Must've been stolen by the mine supervisor. Never heard of any Infected workers getting a single cent of compensation.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: Judging from the fancy way you dress, you must be a sheltered little princess who's never seen an Infected? If you're out here looking to hand out condolences, I've got plenty of tragic stories for you.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: No, I'm just an ordinary girl. Extremely ordinary...
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: But, I did have a thought. If you know who took your compensation money, why not try to get it back from him?
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Come in.
attributes.name: Mine Supervisor

attributes.content: G'day. I'm a hunter assigned here to carry out an escort mission. Here's my registration certificate and my provisional assignment document.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Huh? I don't think I've seen you before. And our hunter...
attributes.name: Mine Supervisor

attributes.content: Also, I have three companions ready to help me on the mission.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: What the hell are you talking about? How could––
attributes.name: Mine Supervisor

attributes.content: You again...
attributes.name: Mine Supervisor

attributes.content: We're just here to get our money back.
attributes.name: Knife-Wielding Bandit

attributes.content: P-Put that knife down... S-Someone, help me...
attributes.name: Mine Supervisor

attributes.content: Save your breath. After you screwed us, we were forced to turn to banditry. Now, we're not afraid to use these knives.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: ...Is this really going to work?
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: I'm sure of it.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: To sum things up, I'll go to the camp first to ask around and see if any of the hunters are going to the mine soon, to get a general grasp of the mission.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Then, if any of them are nice enough and willing to help us out, we'll take their place and go into the mine. If they aren't willing to help... We'll just borrow their names and slip in before them.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Oh, but I'm actually no good with lying. You might have to help me smooth things out to sound convincing.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: After we get past the guards, we just have to avoid everyone along the way.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: You sure make it sound easy.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: Well, I am a hunter after all, and I'm good at staying hidden. The beasties never see me, even with how keen their senses are.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: If we are seen though, let me think... playing it cool is probably the best option. We don't look that suspicious, so it's not like strangers will remember our faces.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Heh. Alright then, I'll lead the way.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: Hunter... why are you doing this for us? Do we look so pathetic you're taking pity on us?
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: Uhh, I wouldn't put it that way...
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Maybe it's because I have a question I'd like answered.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Oh, by the way, can I still file a report with the company about the misappropriation of compensation funds?
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Fine, I'll hand it over. That's all you want, right? I'll give it all back...
attributes.name: Mine Supervisor

attributes.content: Don't think we'll take an IOU or anything like that. I want to see cold, hard cash.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: If we hadn't trusted you in the first place, you would've gotten a visit from us a long time ago.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: Eek... There's cash... in that safe over there... Here's the key.
attributes.name: Mine Supervisor

attributes.content: Go fetch it. One portion each for the three of us.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: Sure... But can't we take a bit more?
attributes.name: Apprehensive Bandit

attributes.content: It's just in case we get caught. Plus, I'd like to show this asshole what it means to have some dignity.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: You're just an Infected. What do you know about dignity?
attributes.name: Mine Supervisor

attributes.content: And that hunter over there... Who exactly are you? I thought you were here to ask for compensation too.
attributes.name: Mine Supervisor

attributes.content: Oh... Actually, I just wanted to ask you a question.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Since you're not hurting for cash or anything, why would you take compensation money from the Infected who need it to survive?
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: It's not like they'll ever be employable again, so the money would just vanish into thin air, right? It'd be a damn shame to waste perfectly good money on the Infected.
attributes.name: Mine Supervisor

attributes.content: You're a real piece of shit.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: Hunter, you went through all this effort just to ask that question?
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: Well, not exactly. It's just... the thought never crossed my mind before.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Who stole my compensation money from the company, and why?
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Yeah. Next, we'll probably head to a nearby town and try our luck again. Maybe someone will have something for us to do.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: You're really not gonna go after the people who screwed you over?
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: Uhh, I don't think it's even possible anymore. I never realized I was being screwed over in the first place, so I have no idea who to talk to about it now.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Plus, I'm ready to get out of here, and leave the past behind.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Right, you mentioned you were saving money for a ticket out.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: Since you've done so much for us and spent so much of your time, let us repay you by covering the rest of your fare.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: Though it's not exactly a king's ransom...
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: Hah, you're pretty good people after all~
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: To be honest, I never guessed you'd be Infected too, with the way you ran up to that bastard just to ask such a basic question.
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: Did you get the answer you were looking for?
attributes.name: Bandit Leader

attributes.content: Of course not. I didn't like what he said at all.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: But, a lot of people think just like him, right? They just don't take Infected people seriously, and without any good reason.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Even I...
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Huh...?
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Woah, Aerlie, you actually picked up!
attributes.name: Voice from the Communicator

attributes.content: We just decided to try calling, but didn't think you'd actually be in a place with reception.
attributes.name: Voice from the Communicator

attributes.content: Can you hear? They're performing 'April' over here! They sound pretty scuffed, but you can really tell from your end, right?
attributes.name: Voice from the Communicator

attributes.content: Hehe, I guess you won't be missing out after all! To our dear Aerlie, thank you for laying the first cornerstone of the greatest art district in Iron Carrot City!
attributes.name: Voice from the Communicator

attributes.content: Hahaha... *cough*, *cough*...
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Aerlie, if you want to say goodbye to them in person, this is your last chance.
If you want to ask your friends if they'll still accept you despite being Infected, this is also the best chance for that. While you're not too distant, while your relationship is still tight-knit.
––Those thoughts cross through her mind, but the Cautus simply listens to the whole song while quietly gripping the communicator.
Pass on this message from me: As long as they keep practicing, they'll sound great!
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: All right, I guess that's that. You always remember to have fun now~
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Oh, the Infected guys already left.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Maybe if I get another chance someday, I'll write to my friends again and tell them what happened.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Since becoming Infected, I've never felt that level of warmth and kindness... and I want them to stay with me a bit longer.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: But at the end of the day, the most important thing is still... what I think about myself.
attributes.name: Aerlie

attributes.content: Well, time to go. I hope that company's advert isn't just empty promises.
attributes.name: Aerlie
